biotools.summary: Package for normalizing microarray data in single and multiple replicate experiments and fitting a normal-uniform mixture to detect differentially expressed genes in the cases where the two samples are being compared directly or indirectly (via a common reference sample).

bioschemas.name: nudge
bioschemas.summary: Package for normalizing microarray data in single and multiple replicate experiments and fitting a normal-uniform mixture to detect differentially expressed genes in the cases where the two samples are being compared directly or indirectly (via a common reference sample).
